import { useState } from 'react'; import '../App.css'; const URI = process.env.REACT_APP_URI; export const Principal = () => { const [titulo, setTitulo] = useState('') const [descripcion, setDescripcion] = useState('') const [alertError, setAlertError] = useState('') const [state, setState] = useState('') const closeAlert = () => ( $().alert('close') ) const handleSutmit = async (e) => { try { e.preventDefault(); const res = await fetch(`${URI}crearNotas`, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ titulo, descripcion }) }) const data = await res.json(); console.log(data); setState(false) setAlertError(false) } catch (error) { setState(true) setAlertError(true) } } return (
Note app
Crear Nota
setTitulo(e.target.value)} value={titulo} />
